attributes.action: Enforce Banking Regulations For UK Paypal Customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing numbers of UK Citizens experience problems whilst using Paypal UK, combined with the fact that Paypal is a) no longer regulated by the FSA  b) duly licensed as a Luxembourg credit institution (ie. a bank) - This petition requests that UK Banking Regulations are enforced for UK Paypal Customers.

rejection.details: Please use full and correct name and address details.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
